GET_LAST_ENTRIES
### check if measurement has enough entries and get last 5 values if true
query
query:
from(bucket: "edgedb")
  |> range(start: -5h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "voltagedrive3" and (r["_field"] == "value"))
  |> count()

name: GET_LAST_ENTRIES

  |> range(start: -5h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "currentdrive3" and (r["_field"] == "value"))
  |> count()
